block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is Paper Plane 25 of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. The Flying Bat designed by Max Hulme. We are 25% done of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge!!! This plane needs to be release really high. It will dive and glide just like a bat. It is 2020 October 27, just in time for Halloween. This is an origami plane folded from a square sheet. Enjoy!!! If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 024 : Shuttlecock by Michael G. LaFosse", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/qaaBMV0rFG0 Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee@Heap Art

meta_description: Heap Art Origami tutorial, How to fold Flying Bat by Max Hulme
meta_keywords: Heap Art Origami Tutorial, Heap Art, origami, tutorial, video, how to, Paper airplane, origami plane, exotic paper airplane, flying bat by max hulme, Max Hulme
